Package services

Class GenericService<RequestType extends GenericRequest,​ResponseType extends GenericResponse>

  • java.lang.Object
    • services.GenericService<RequestType,​ResponseType>
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    ClearService, EventService, FileService, FillService, LoadService, LoginService, PersonService, RegisterService
    public abstract class GenericService<RequestType extends GenericRequest,​ResponseType extends GenericResponse>
extends java.lang.Object
    A definition of "required" methods for all services. It also contains helpful utility functions that are shared across many types of services.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field Description
      private java.lang.String serviceName
      A string to help identify the service (primarily used for error messages)

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor Description
      GenericService​(java.lang.String serviceName)
      Runs for all generic service types.

    • Constructor Detail

      • GenericService

        public GenericService​(java.lang.String serviceName)
        Runs for all generic service types. This sets the service name for the service instance.
        Parameters:
        serviceName - is the name of the service (ideally, the name of the class)

                            RequestType request)
        Main entry point for anything wanting to use the service. This will
        Parameters:
        method - is the HTTP method being used
        request - is the HTTP request, parsed for the service
        Returns:
        the HTTP response object to send back to the client

      • createErrorResponse

        private ResponseType createErrorResponse​(java.lang.String errMsg)
        Creates an error response of ResponseType with some given error message
        Parameters:
        errMsg - is the message to include in the response
        Returns:
        the failed response of ResponseType

      • createUnauthenticatedResponse

        protected ResponseType createUnauthenticatedResponse()
        Creates an error response specifically for unauthorized requests (To be used in subclasses that authenticate requests)
        Returns:
        the failed response indicating an authentication failure

      • createIncompleteResponse

        protected ResponseType createIncompleteResponse​(java.lang.String badProp)
        Creates an error response indicating a request was missing required properties (To be used in subclasses that need it)
        Parameters:
        badProp - is the missing property (or properties)
        Returns:
        the failed response

      • onGet

        public ResponseType onGet​(RequestType request,
                          Database database)
                   throws InvalidHTTPMethodException,
                          DatabaseException
        Overridable function that is called when a GET request is sent to the service
        Parameters:
        request - is the request object from the GET request
        database - is the active database to get/insert data with
        Returns:
        the response object to send back to the user
        Throws:
        InvalidHTTPMethodException - if the subclassed service does not implement this method type
        DatabaseException - if the database throws a sql temper tantrum

      • onPost

        public ResponseType onPost​(RequestType request,
                           Database database)
                    throws InvalidHTTPMethodException,
                           DatabaseException
        Overridable function that is called when a POST request is sent to the service
        Parameters:
        request - is the request object from the POST request
        database - is the active database to get/insert data with
        Returns:
        the response object to send back to the user
        Throws:
        InvalidHTTPMethodException - if the subclassed service does not implement this method type
        DatabaseException - if the database throws a sql temper tantrum

      • createSpecificErrorResponse

        protected abstract ResponseType createSpecificErrorResponse​(java.lang.String errMsg)
        Overridable function that converts an error message into the specific response type. Setting the message and success fields is not required.
        Parameters:
        errMsg - is the error message from the error that occurred
        Returns:
        the response

      • throwInvalidHTTPMethod

        private void throwInvalidHTTPMethod​(java.lang.String method)
                             throws InvalidHTTPMethodException
        Helper function that throws an InvalidHTTPMethodException for invalid/unimplemented HTTP method
        Parameters:
        method - is the HTTP method that the service failed with
        Throws:
        InvalidHTTPMethodException - always
